00033 #include <Python.h>
00034 
00035 #include "bpy_operator_wrap.h"
00036 #include "WM_api.h"
00037 #include "WM_types.h"
00038 
00039 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"
00040 
00041 #include "RNA_access.h"
00042 #include "RNA_define.h"
00043 
00044 #include "bpy_rna.h"
00045 
00046 static void operator_properties_init(wmOperatorType *ot)
00047 {
00048     PyObject *py_class = ot->ext.data;
00049     RNA_struct_blender_type_set(ot->ext.srna, ot);
00050 
00051     /* only call this so pyrna_deferred_register_class gives a useful error
00052      * WM_operatortype_append_ptr will call RNA_def_struct_identifier
00053      * later */
00054     RNA_def_struct_identifier(ot->srna, ot->idname);
00055 
00056     if (pyrna_deferred_register_class(ot->srna, py_class) != 0) {
00057         PyErr_Print(); /* failed to register operator props */
00058         PyErr_Clear();
00059     }
00060 }
00061 
00062 void operator_wrapper(wmOperatorType *ot, void *userdata)
00063 {
00064     /* take care not to overwrite anything set in
00065      * WM_operatortype_append_ptr before opfunc() is called */
00066     StructRNA *srna = ot->srna;
00067     *ot = *((wmOperatorType *)userdata);
00068     ot->srna = srna; /* restore */
00069 
00070     operator_properties_init(ot);
00071 
00072     /* XXX - not nice, set the first enum as searchable, should have a way for python to set */
00073     {
00074         PointerRNA ptr;
00075         PropertyRNA *prop;
00076 
00077         RNA_pointer_create(NULL, ot->srna, NULL, &ptr);
00078         prop = RNA_struct_find_property(&ptr, "type");
00079         if (prop) {
00080             ot->prop = prop;
00081         }
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00085 void macro_wrapper(wmOperatorType *ot, void *userdata)
00086 {
00087     wmOperatorType *data = (wmOperatorType *)userdata;
00088 
00089     /* only copy a couple of things, the rest is set by the macro registration */
00090     ot->name = data->name;
00091     ot->idname = data->idname;
00092     ot->description = data->description;
00093     ot->flag |= data->flag; /* append flags to the one set by registration */
00094     ot->pyop_poll = data->pyop_poll;
00095     ot->ui = data->ui;
00096     ot->ext = data->ext;
00097 
00098     operator_properties_init(ot);
00099 }
00100 
00101 PyObject *PYOP_wrap_macro_define(PyObject *UNUSED(self), PyObject *args)
00102 {
00103     wmOperatorType *ot;
00104     wmOperatorTypeMacro *otmacro;
00105     PyObject *macro;
00106     PointerRNA ptr_otmacro;
00107     StructRNA *srna;
00108 
00109     char *opname;
00110     const char *macroname;
00111 
00112     if (!PyArg_ParseTuple(args, "Os:_bpy.ops.macro_define", &macro, &opname))
00113         return NULL;
00114 
00115     if (WM_operatortype_find(opname, TRUE) == NULL) {
00116         PyErr_Format(PyExc_ValueError,
00117                      "Macro Define: '%s' is not a valid operator id",
00118                      opname);
00119         return NULL;
00120     }
00121 
00122     /* identifiers */
00123     srna = srna_from_self(macro, "Macro Define:");
00124     macroname = RNA_struct_identifier(srna);
00125 
00126     ot = WM_operatortype_find(macroname, TRUE);
00127 
00128     if (!ot) {
00129         PyErr_Format(PyExc_ValueError,
00130                      "Macro Define: '%s' is not a valid macro or hasn't been registered yet",
00131                      macroname);
00132         return NULL;
00133     }
00134 
00135     otmacro = WM_operatortype_macro_define(ot, opname);
00136 
00137     RNA_pointer_create(NULL, &RNA_OperatorMacro, otmacro, &ptr_otmacro);
00138 
00139     return pyrna_struct_CreatePyObject(&ptr_otmacro);
00140 }
